ThingDef.label: archotech clavicle module
ThingDef.description: An artifical clavicle module built by an archotech. It's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. You can install it to clavicle module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech arm module
ThingDef.description: An artifical arm module built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural arm, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. You can install it to arm module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech humerus module
ThingDef.description: An artifical humerus module built by an archotech. It's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. You can install it to humerus module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech radius module
ThingDef.description: An artifical radius module built by an archotech. It's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. You can install it to radius module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech hand module
ThingDef.description: An artifical hand module built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural hand, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. You can install it to hand module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech finger module
ThingDef.description: An artifical finger module built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural finger, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. You can install it to finger module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech femur module
ThingDef.description: An artifical femur module built by an archotech. It's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. You can install it to femur module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech tibia module
ThingDef.description: An artifical tibia module built by an archotech. It's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. You can install it to tibia module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech foot module
ThingDef.description: An artifical foot module built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural foot, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. You can install it to foot module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech toe module
ThingDef.description: An artifical toe module built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural toe, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. You can install it to toe module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced ranged platform module
ThingDef.description: An advanced ranged platform module. If it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. With stabilizer and targeting system can give your pawn great accuracy and turn your pawn to specialized for ranged combat. You can install it to clavicle module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced melee platform module
ThingDef.description: An advanced melee platform module. If it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. With sensory motor and targeting system can give your pawn great melee damage and turn your pawn to specialized for melee combat. You can install it to clavicle module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced power arm module
ThingDef.description: An advanced power arm module built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural arm, have high blunt damage, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. You can install it to arm module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced power claw module
ThingDef.description: An advanced power claw module built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural hand, has sharp claw attached to it, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. You can install it to hand module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: adamantium bone module
ThingDef.description: A bone module that crafted with high quality adamantium alloy. Able to sustain almost all attack. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. You can install it to all bone module slot. Requires modules surgery research to install it.
